title: Temporal Trends in Arrhythmia Burden Following Mavacamten Initiation in Obstructive Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy
details: K Roehl, M Suppah, R Arsanjani, K Siontis, J Geske… - Journal of Cardiac Failure, 2024
abstract: Introduction Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM) is the most common inherited cardiomyopathy. Mavacamten, the first-in-class drug approved by the FDA for the treatment of HCM, has shown efficacy in improving clinical symptoms. However, the …
